CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** Icon for the related Badge Type with Badge Name.
CustomField.formula: IF(OrderApi__Badge_Type__c != null, OrderApi__Badge_Type__r.OrderApi__Icon__c, "Image Not Available") & " " & HYPERLINK("/" & OrderApi__Badge_Type__c, OrderApi__Badge_Type__r.Name, "_tab")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** Icon for the related Badge Type with Badge Name.
CustomField.label: Enabled Badge Type
